description: Perfectly chilled, a white chocolate white Russian is sophisticated and beautiful, a wonderfully sweet and creamy dessert drink.
ingredients: [{"name": "white chocolate", "units": "cup", "amount": "¼"}, {"name": "vodka", "units": "ounce", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "white chocolate liqueur", "units": "ounce", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "coffee liqueur", "units": "ounce", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "Irish cream liqueur", "units": "ounce", "amount": "1"}, {"name": "half-and-half", "units": "ounce", "amount": "1"}]
instructions: To Rim the Glass: Dip the edge of a rocks glass into the melted white chocolate about ¼”. Set aside. Make the Cocktail: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the vodka, white chocolate liquor, coffee liquor, Irish cream liqueur, and half-and-half. Shake until chilled– about 30 seconds. Strain into the rimmed rocks glass. Serve immediately.
notes: Lighten it up or make it richer, using milk or heavy cream instead of half-and-half. Serve it on the rocks instead of shaken with ice.
